nodes.description: 汽车炸弹在巴基斯坦费萨拉巴德市加油站爆炸，引发气体罐连锁爆炸
nodes.support_text: a car bomb tore through a gas station in the Pakistani city of Faisalabad. The bomb caused several gas cylinders at the station to explode, destroying cars and buildings.

nodes.description: 爆炸导致至少20人死亡、120人受伤，死亡人数可能上升
nodes.support_text: at least 20 people have been killed and more than 120 injured after a car bomb tore through a gas station... Police said that the number of dead could rise as many of the injured were in a critical condition.

nodes.description: 目击者描述爆炸如同地震，现场出现金属残骸和浓烟
nodes.support_text: The blast was so large that, according to witnesses, it reduced the station to a heap of twisted metal and rubble. A security guard at the nearby office of Pakistan International Airlines said: 'The earth moved as in an earthquake, and there was thick smoke all around.'

nodes.description: 救援人员使用重型机械清理废墟，寻找被困幸存者
nodes.support_text: Heavy diggers and cranes have been brought in because there are believed to be survivors still trapped in the debris.

nodes.description: 巴基斯坦塔利班宣称对袭击负责，指控为报复成员在押期间死亡
nodes.support_text: The Pakistani Taliban said they carried out the attack, saying it was to avenge the death in custody of one of their members.

nodes.description: 费萨拉巴德市专员证实爆炸由汽车炸弹在气体罐附近引发，非自杀袭击
nodes.support_text: 'It was not a suicide attack,' Faisalabad city commissioner Tahir Husain said. 'The bomb exploded near the gas cylinders that triggered a bigger blast.'

nodes.description: 总理吉拉尼对事件表示哀悼，谴责暴力行为
nodes.support_text: Prime Minister Yousuf Raza Gilani has expressed his sorrow over the deaths.

nodes.description: 官员初步推测塔利班为袭击者，但未正式宣布责任归属
nodes.support_text: officials have indicated they believe the Taliban are responsible.

nodes.description: 费萨拉巴德作为纺织业中心，近年首次遭恐怖袭击
nodes.support_text: this is the first bombing in Faisalabad in recent years.

nodes.description: 该市位于旁遮普省，当地塔利班势力近期增强
nodes.support_text: the city is in Pakistan's Punjab province where pro-Taliban militant groups have been increasing in strength.

nodes.description: 塔利班过去多次针对安全机构发动大规模袭击
nodes.support_text: The Pakistani Taliban have launched attacks on security establishments with devastating effect on a number of occasions in the past few years.

edges.support_text: after a car bomb tore through a gas station
